%%%End-Header%%%

%%%Begin-Job%%%
start /w %%%AppPath%%%\%%%AppExec%%% -a %%%JobPath%%% -f "%%%JobName%%%" -f2 "%%%JobSimuOutName%%%" -s "%%%JobSimuName%%%" -i %%%JobLenght%%% -p 1 -o 1 -e 1 -v 0 --without-gnuplot -V 1 --num_threads %%%JobNumThreads%%% > ..\%%%JobName%%%-%%%JobSimuName%%%.txt

%%%End-Job%%%

%%%Begin-Footer%%%
PAUSE
%%%End-Footer%%%
